body:
Hey I've posted a map to the map release forum if you want to see it its called Ignicia, I made it with _Spazz_, FlashFireK and Unecookie. If anyone is willing to do the XML that would be amazing if you just comment that your happy to do so.

Also I will edit the map release giving full credit to the person who does it.

Thanks for your time.
-Rockyyyyy
